>>Weather Salamanca

The climate in Salamanca is warm and temperate. In Salamanca, the precipitation during summers is significantly higher in comparison to winters. The Köppen-Geiger climate classification identifies this particular weather pattern as belonging to the category of Cwa. The temperature here averages 19.6 °C | 67.3 °F. The annual rainfall is 749 mm | 29.5 inch.

Due to its proximity to the equator, it is quite challenging to precisely delineate summers in Salamanca. The period of April, May, June, July, August, September, October is widely regarded as the peak season for visitation.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Salamanca

The driest month is December, with 4 mm | 0.2 inch of rain. The maximum quantity of rainfall is observed during the month of July, exhibiting an average value of 184 mm | 7.2 inch.

average temperature by month Salamanca

May is the warmest month of the year. The temperature in May averages 23.7 °C | 74.7 °F. During the month of January, there is a notable drop in temperature, with an average low of approximately 16.0 °C | 60.8 °F.

There is a difference of 180 mm | 7 inch of precipitation between the driest and wettest months. The degree of fluctuation in the yearly temperature is approximately 7.7 °C | 13.9 °F.

In terms of relative humidity, the month that exhibits the highest level is July with a percentage of 28.16. Conversely, April has been recorded as having the lowest amount of relative humidity at only 28.16. It is noteworthy that July has the highest number of rainy days, amounting to 19.80, whereas the month with the least rainfall is December, experiencing only 0.93 wet days.

Hours of sunshine in Salamanca

avg. hours of sun

Total hours of sun

On average, the location of Salamanca records the highest number of daily sunshine hours during May. The mean duration of sunlight per day in this month is approximately 11.45, with a total cumulative count reaching up to 354.87.

On average, Salamanca records the lowest daily sunshine hours in January. During this period, there is an average of 8.08 hours of sunlight per day and a total accumulation of 242.47 hours.

Throughout the year, a total of 3512.25 hours of light are recorded in the location of Salamanca. The monthly average for sunlight is approximately 115.49 hours.
